column5: does anyone have info on map chips for hb 788ci for manitoba i've been told they have been updated to include manitoba....are they any good? what is the price and where can they be bought thx
Assuming your from Manitoba. I would check with the guys at Pro-Am tackle in Winnipeg. The chip works great!

I have the Navionics Gold 2XG. I have only been out on Lac du Bonnet with it but it is supposed to haVe much more. Few more weeks I will be out on Pine Falls/ Lake Winnipeg. Basically only has eastern MB waters.

What lakes are you looking for? Yes there is a chip for Canada in both premium and platinum. Here is a link to it http://www.navionics.com/product/water/plotter-charts If you have a lake that you like some screen shots for yah.

I got mine last fall when they were first introduced - Primary usage is Lake Winnipeg. Both Pine Falls and South Basin. Are they good? Well, they are heads and shoulders better than anything I've had before, but it's not a 1' contour map either.It provides some general ideas of where depth changes are, and where river channels are located, but do not expect exact foot-for-foot contour accuracy.Spendy too, but Manitoba is a large area.
thx for the replies....it helped...cant wait to try it. wonder why there is nothing from pine falls to mcaurther falls ? still lotsa stuff to see
